summary: ContinueAsNew options DTO doesn't inherit the Workflow's Task Queue by default, violating Temporal's documented behavior that continued workflows should run on the same compatible task queue as the original.
userImpact: Workflows using ContinueAsNew may not route to the correct task queue, potentially breaking compatibility and versioning strategies.
rootCause: ContinueAsNew options DTO doesn't automatically inherit the parent Workflow's Task Queue setting
resolutionDetails: ContinueAsNew options DTO was updated to inherit the Workflow's Task Queue by default
keyQuote: By default, a versioned Task Queue's Continue-as-New function starts the continued Workflow on the same compatible set as the original Workflow.
